context: Zillow acquired Trulia in 2015 to become the dominant real estate portal. The Zestimate home valuation and rental listings made Zillow the most visited real estate website.

competitors.name: Realtor.com
competitors.notes: Official site of NAR with MLS listings

competitors.name: Homes.com
competitors.notes: Real estate portal competing for listings

competitors.name: Apartment.com
competitors.notes: Rental listings platform owned by CoStar

competitors.name: Traditional Agents
competitors.notes: Real estate agents with local expertise
